statements: SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, start_date, is_adherent FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, frequency FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, start_date, end_date FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE is_adherent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM PaientPrescriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(CASE WHEN is_adherent THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS adherent_count FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(DATEDIFF('day', start_date, end_date)) AS average_duration FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(DATEDIFF('day', start_date, end_date)) AS average_duration FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND is_adherent = TRUE GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, MIN(start_date) AS first_prescription_date, MAX(end_date) AS last_prescription_end_date FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Daily' GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, start_date, dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, start_date, end_date, is_adherent FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE is_adherent = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE '%Cough%';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE LOWER(medication_name) = 'acetaminophen';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, frequency, CASE WHEN frequency = 'Daily' THEN 'Everyday' ELSE 'Other' END AS dose_frequency FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency, start_date, end_date FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE dosage IS NOT NULL AND frequency IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, end_date, CASE WHEN end_date < CURRENT_DATE THEN 'Expired' ELSE 'Active' END AS prescription_status FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND dosage = '10mg';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Once a day';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, start_date, end_date FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE is_adherent = True;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM PatientPrescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(start_date) AS latest_start_date FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(CAST(dosage AS FLOAT)) AS total_dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, AVG(CAST(dosage AS FLOAT)) AS avg_dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, AVG(CAST(dosage AS FLOAT)) AS avg_dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Tylenol' GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Twice a day' GROUP BY patient_id, medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(CAST(dosage AS FLOAT)) AS total_dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE is_adherent = True GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE is_adherent = False GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(DISTINCT medication_name) AS num_unique_medication FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, AVG(start_date) AS avg_start_date FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id, medication_name;
SELECT medication_name, SUM(CAST(dosage AS FLOAT)) AS total_dosage FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE frequency = 'Three times a day' GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM PatientPrescriptions WHERE is_adherent = False GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id, medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(end_date) - MIN(start_date) AS duration FROM PatientPrescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence;
SELECT adherence_date, taken FROM medication_adherence;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE taken = TRUE;
SELECT prescription_id, adherence_date FROM medication_adherence;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, frequency FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, adherence_id FROM medication_adherence;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage <= 50;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 'abcd-1234';
SELECT adherence_id, prescription_id, taken FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 200 AND patient_id = 'efgh-5678';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence ORDER BY adherence_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions JOIN medication_adherence ON prescriptions.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' AND dosage > 100

SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_date FROM prescriptions JOIN medication_adherence ON prescriptions.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id WHERE taken = true ORDER BY adherence_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) FROM prescriptions
SELECT medication_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM prescriptions GROUP BY medication_name HAVING AVG(dosage) > 50

SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, dosage, adherence_date FROM prescriptions JOIN medication_adherence ON prescriptions.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id WHERE adherence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM Prescription;
SELECT doctor_name, prescription_date FROM Prescription;
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence;
SELECT adherence_date, adherence_time FROM MedicationAdherence;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patient;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, instructions FROM Prescription;
SELECT patient_id, prescription_id, adherence_id FROM MedicationAdherence;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Prescription WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE is_taken = TRUE;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, medication_name FROM Prescription WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, adherence_date, adherence_time FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE adherence_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patient WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT doctor_name, prescription_date FROM Prescription WHERE doctor_name LIKE '%Brown%';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, instructions FROM Prescription WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT adherence_id, is_taken FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE is_taken = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name, pr.medication_name FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT p.patient_name, pa.adherence_date FROM Patient p JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON p.patient_id = pa.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE is_taken = TRUE;
SELECT pr.doctor_name, pa.adherence_date FROM Prescription pr JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, pr.prescription_date FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS adherence_count FROM Patient p JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON p.patient_id = pa.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name;
SELECT pr.medication_name, COUNT(*) AS adherence_count FROM Prescription pr JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id GROUP BY pr.medication_name;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.medication_name, COUNT(*) AS adherence_count FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id GROUP BY p.patient_name, pr.medication_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name, pa.adherence_time FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id;
SELECT DISTINCT p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.prescription_date > '2020-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name, pa.adherence_date FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id WHERE pa.is_taken = TRUE;
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.medication_name, pa.adherence_date FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id WHERE pa.adherence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name, MAX(pa.adherence_time) AS last_adherence_time FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id GROUP BY p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(adherence_date, prescription_date)) AS avg_days_between_prescribed_and_taken FROM Prescription pr JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.medication_name, pa.adherence_date, pa.adherence_time FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id ORDER BY pa.adherence_date DESC, pa.adherence_time DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, pr.doctor_name, pa.adherence_date, pa.adherence_time FROM Patient p JOIN Prescription pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN MedicationAdherence pa ON pr.prescription_id = pa.prescription_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient;
SELECT patient_name FROM patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT prescription_id, doctor_name, medication_name FROM prescription;
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE dose_taken=FALSE;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality FROM doctor;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patient WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM doctor WHERE speciality='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM prescription WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_date='2022-03-15';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality, hospital_name FROM doctor WHERE hospital_name='General Hospital';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, frequency FROM prescription WHERE dosage='50mg';
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT doctor_name, speciality FROM doctor WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr. %';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM patient WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient;
SELECT AVG(dose_taken::int) AS adherence_rate FROM medication_adherence;
SELECT DISTINCT speciality FROM doctor;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT prescription_id, doctor_name, medication_name FROM prescription WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medication_adherence WHERE adherence_date > '2022-01-01' AND dose_taken = True;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality, hospital_name FROM doctor WHERE speciality = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medication_name FROM patient LEFT JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id;
SELECT patient.patient_id, patient.patient_name, medication_adherence.adherence_date FROM patient INNER JOIN medication_adherence ON patient.patient_id = medication_adherence.patient_id;

SELECT prescription.doctor_name, prescription.medication_name, medication_adherence.adherence_date FROM prescription INNER JOIN medication_adherence ON prescription.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT doctor.doctor_name, prescription.medication_name, medication_adherence.adherence_date FROM doctor INNER JOIN prescription ON doctor.doctor_name = prescription.doctor_name INNER JOIN medication_adherence ON prescription.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id;
SELECT patient.patient_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS total_days FROM patient JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient.patient_name;
SELECT doctor.doctor_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM doctor JOIN prescription ON doctor.doctor_name = prescription.doctor_name GROUP BY doctor.doctor_name;
SELECT patient.patient_id, patient.patient_name, prescription.doctor_name FROM patient JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id WHERE DATE(start_date) = '2022-03-15';

SELECT prescription.medication_name, COUNT(*) AS adherence_count FROM prescription JOIN medication_adherence ON prescription.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id GROUP BY prescription.medication_name HAVING adherence_count > 3;

SELECT patient.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM patient LEFT JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient.patient_name HAVING prescription_count < 2;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM prescription GROUP BY doctor_name;

SELECT patient.patient_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS total_days FROM patient JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient.patient_name HAVING total_days > 30;

SELECT doctor.doctor_name, patient.patient_name, medication_adherence.adherence_date FROM doctor JOIN prescription ON doctor.doctor_name = prescription.doctor_name JOIN medication_adherence ON prescription.prescription_id = medication_adherence.prescription_id;

SELECT patient.patient_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM patient JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient.patient_name HAVING avg_duration > 20;

SELECT doctor.doctor_name, speciality, hospital_name, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM doctor JOIN prescription ON doctor.doctor_name = prescription.doctor_name GROUP BY doctor.doctor_name, speciality, hospital_name;

SELECT patient.patient_name, medication_adherence.adherence_date, prescription.medication_name FROM patient JOIN medication_adherence ON patient.patient_id = medication_adherence.patient_id JOIN prescription ON medication_adherence.prescription_id = prescription.prescription_id WHERE adherence_date >= '2022-01-01' AND adherence_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, birth_date, gender, address FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, medication, dosage, start_date, end_date FROM prescriptions;
SELECT medication, dosage FROM prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM medication_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, medication, dosage, intake_time, date, adherence FROM medication_records;
SELECT medication, intake_time FROM medication_records;
SELECT * FROM medication_reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, patient_id, reminder_time, reminder_date, message FROM medication_reminders;
SELECT reminder_time, message FROM medication_reminders;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, medication, date FROM patients INNER JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON prescriptions.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication, date, adherence FROM patients INNER JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, reminder_time, message FROM patients INNER JOIN medication_reminders ON patients.patient_id = medication_reminders.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, medication, start_date, end_date FROM patients INNER JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON prescriptions.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital, medication, dosage FROM doctors INNER JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, birth_date FROM patients WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'

SELECT patients.patient_name, doctors.specialty FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id JOIN doctors ON prescriptions.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctors.specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT prescription_id, medication, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE start_date >='2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Neurology'
SELECT patient_name, medication, intake_time FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id WHERE adherence = TRUE
SELECT * FROM medication_reminders WHERE reminder_time = '08:00:00' AND reminder_date = '2021-10-20'
SELECT patient_name, medication, dosage, intake_time FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id WHERE date = '2021-10-25'
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(prescription_id) AS total_prescriptions FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING total_prescriptions > 5
SELECT patient_name, SUM(CAST(dosage AS DECIMAL)) AS total_dosage FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING total_records < 10
SELECT doctor_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name

SELECT patient_name, medication, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name, medication HAVING total_records > 3
SELECT patient_name, medication, adherence FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id WHERE intake_time = '12:00:00' AND date = '2021-10-20'
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY total_patients DESC

SELECT patient_name, AVG(CASE WHEN adherence = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS adherence_rate FROM patients JOIN medication_records ON patients.patient_id = medication_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name
SELECT doctor_name, SUM(CAST(dosage AS DECIMAL)) AS total_dosage FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(reminder_id) AS total_reminders FROM patients JOIN medication_reminders ON patients.patient_id = medication_reminders.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING total_reminders < 5
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING total_patients > 2
